body:
So recently, a good friend of mine who is by the name of - 4lextr - was banned for 'Hacking, Kill-aura, forcefield etc.' he opposes this because he was not hacking. He was banned by a moderator who poorly validated this claim. Before anyone starts shouting at me, ;tell him to appeal!' he did. Only to find that he was denied for something he did not do. This gives me the urge to throw my computer out of the window. I really do hope that this issue gets fixed soon, because 4lextr was in a good team and everything was going smoothly until a poorly-chosen moderator made a narrow-minded, poor-decision to bring this to an abrupt end! Please give a valid reason for what happend. in Alex (4lextr)'s own words he said that 'avicus is a unique server, there is none other like it'. I think that the Anti-Cheat system should surely be checked after this incident.

Kindest regards, WestTidePvP

replies.body:
He wasn't banned by Anti-Cheat, he was banned by a staff member.
He didn't get banned for what you mentioned, Kill Aura and Forcefield etc., he was banned for Safe Aura and Anti knockback.
While the Safe Aura was questionable, the Anti knockback was blatant in the evidence. There is no reason to unban him unless he can prove the given evidence wrong.
Also, please elaborate on how the moderator "poorly validated this claim"
